sec.title: Ethics approval
sec.p: Ethical approval for this study was obtained from the Animal Ethics Committee of the Faculty of Medicine and the Research Ethics Committee (Protocol Number 05/2558), Faculty of Medicine, CMU, Chiang Mai Province, Thailand.
